name: Monkey King Bar
description: A powerful staff used by a master warrior.

abilities.name: Pierce
abilities.description: Grants the wielder's attack a chance to pierce through evasion and deal bonus magical damage.
notes: The bonus damage is considered as a conditional attack damage bonus and is magical damage
Although the attack damage bonus values are not displayed in the HUD, it is still considered and directly added to the unit's attack damage
It is not considered by lifesteal, crit or cleave
It can be reduced only by flat reductions (e.g. magical damage barrier)
Since it is considered bonus attack damage, it is not affected by percentage-based attack damage bonuses or reductions
Pierce from Javelin-based items fully stack with another and themselves, except for multiple Monkey King Bars
Multiple sources can proc on the same attack
Illusions can use the accuracy, but do not apply the bonus magical attack damage
Does not work against buildings, but works against wards and allied units
Adds an average of 56 magical damage to every attack

additionalInfo: This item is shown as a Team Item in the shop window when purchased by an ally
